00034 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDObject : public FUObject
00035 {
00036 private:
00037     DeclareObjectType(FUObject);
00038 
00039     // The COLLADA document that owns this object
00040     FCDocument* document;
00041 
00042     // An handle which has no meaning to FCollada but is available for users to
00043     // attach objects to most FCollada objects.
00044     void* userHandle;
00045 
00046     // A flag container for dirtiness.
00047     // This data value will probably be extended to a full bit-flag sometime.
00048     bool dirty;
00049 
00050 public:
00053     FCDObject(FCDocument* document);
00054 
00056     virtual ~FCDObject() {}
00057 
00060     inline FCDocument* GetDocument() { return document; }
00061     inline const FCDocument* GetDocument() const { return document; } 
00066     inline bool IsLocal(const FCDObject* object) const { return document == object->document; }
00067 
00071     inline bool IsExternal(const FCDObject* object) const { return document != object->document; }
00072 
00077     inline void* GetUserHandle() const { return userHandle; }
00078     
00083     inline void SetUserHandle(void* handle) { userHandle = handle; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00084 
00086     inline void SetDirtyFlag() { dirty = true; }
00087 
00089     inline void ResetDirtyFlag() { dirty = false; }
00090 
00092     inline bool GetDirtyFlag() const { return dirty; }
00093 };
00094
